name: OK K.O.! Letâ€™s Play Heroes
description: Based on Cartoon Network's hit show, this game stars pint-sized K.O. as he fights Lord Boxman's evil bots to save Lakewood Plaza Turbo. In this story-driven adventure meets cartoon-brawler, you'll complete quests, unlock moves & collect cards of your Plaza pals as you fight to become a true hero.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 - 64bit Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 680 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 - 64bit Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 960 or higher DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 7 GB available space
